Detailed Description

This file declares an Entry class and 2 exception classes (IndexOutOfBound, ElementNotExist). Some useful functions are also provided in this file.

const C2 &  b 
) [inline]

Compares lexicographical order. Utilizing this function, you can easily overload the `<' operator for your containers, so TreeSet< ArrayList<int> > can be defined.
